main.contactmessage: Right now the contact is not service integrated. Please use mail or other medium

education.school: Birla Institue of Technoilogy and Sciences, Pilani
education.degree: M.Sc. Mathematics and B.E. Computer Science
education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.
Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Summer Intern
work.description: Evaluated some of the open-source libraries for mobile-specific UI components based on React and Integrated them in the DESCO JavaScript Stack. Setup two full-stack app for InOut (leave management portal) and DESFlow (Request Tracker) mobile revamped version show casing the new UI components.

work.company: Web Intelligence and Social Computing Lab, BITS Pilani
work.title: Research Assistant
work.description: Worked under Dr. Yashvardhan Sharma on Event Extraction from code mixed data(Hindi, Malayalam, and Tamil) of social media text.

work.title: Surge Research Intern
work.description: Worked under Dr. Deepak Gupta to develop a Cost-Effective Anti-counterfeiting technology. My project involved identifying 3D textures, authenticating images and generating signatures of images for indexing and searching. This was a part of the larger project to commercialize a patented lab implementation to tackle counterfeiting problem for any product that is being sold anywhere, with the plan to move it out of the IITK lab in the form of an independent startup entity.

work.company: Bhaskaracharya Institute for Space Applications and Geo-Informatics, Gandhi Nagar
work.title: Summer Intern
work.description: Worked on Vehicle Detection to analyze traffic flow within the campus. Developed a system in which given a video, vehicles are detected in each frame using SVM and Haar Cascade Algorithm. The system ran on Distributed File System for large-scale data processing using Dumbo API.

projects.title: Adversarial Neural Cryptography
projects.description: Implemented Learning to Protect Communications with Adversarial Neural Cryptography by Martín Abadi, David G. Andersen as a part of the course project

projects.title: Network In Network
projects.description: Implemented Networks in networks by Min Lin, Qiang Chen, Shuicheng Yan as a part of course project.

projects.title: Biometric Iris Recognition for Low Quality Distance Iris Images
projects.description: (Guide: Prof Kamlesh Tiwari, Assistant professor, Dept. of Computer Science, BITS Pilani.) Used Haar Cascade Classifiers and Histogram of Oriented Gradients (HOG) for eye segmentation followed by thresholding and occlusion removal then using Gabor filters and Hamming Distance for normalization and matching.

projects.title: Forecasting Renewable Energy Resources
projects.description: (Guide: Sumanta Pasari, Assistant professor, Dept. of Mathematics, BITS Pilani.) Forecasting Wind speed, temperature and Pressure from data obtained from Charanka Power Plant, Gujarat Using ARIMA models and Recurrent Neural Networks with LSTM.

projects.title: Advanced Scheduling Algorithms
projects.description: (Guide: Dr Rakhee, Associate professor, Dept. of Mathematics, BITS Pilani.) Developed a library of scheduling algorithms (operation research) covering single machine, parallel machine and shop scheduling in python

projects.title: Other Projects
projects.description: Created a Compiler in C for a dummy language as part of Compiler Construction Course, Implemented DBSCAN using functional programming language Scheme, Wave Generator in Assembly, Algebraic expression simplifier and college constitution in Prolog

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Aditya Shah must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
